level.heading: Limitation of license.
level.text: Not more than one location of business or mobile unit shall be maintained under the same license. More than one license may be issued to the same licensee upon compliance with this chapter for each new license.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-111
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-111, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 26-301.
